turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order an iced espresso from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add honey?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And do they have camel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many shots of espresso do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have caramel there, as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can check.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it looks like they have caramel syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yeah. Can you add that to the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and then six shots of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 6 iced shots of espresso with honey and caramel, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And that should be for the Pitts on Middle Street in Boise.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me order that for you, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you 6 iced shots of espresso with honey and caramel to be picked up at the peet's on myrtle street in boise, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
